body:
I'm going to try and make it to my first meeting. August is usually better
as September gets into end of Gov FY tasks.

Brian

-----Original Message-----
Sent: Friday, November 07, 2014 3:26 PM
To: Radiance general discussion
Dear List,

We're in the early stages of planning next year's workshop, which will be
held at the Penn State University's Naval Yard facility in Philadelphia, PA.
We are currently considering dates in the late August/September time frame.

If you are thinking of going and might be able to make it one time but not
another, please make yourself heard at this time.  Also, if anyone is aware
of competing or complimentary conferences during this period, that would be
helpful.

Cheers,
-Greg
_______________________________________________
Radiance-general mailing list
Radiance-general at radiance-online.org
http://www.radiance-online.org/mailman/listinfo/radiance-general
subject: [Radiance-general] 2015 Workshop date poll
